column5: I am going to Kushog Lake for a week this summer. My question is: are there muskie in this lake and if so how many. Thanks everyone. You can email me if you like. Much appreciated! Landry
Pike were introduced about 10 years ago, but as far as I know and have known there have never been musky there.  Good laker, smallmouth, largemouth and now pike fishing though.
I counted once, I found only 5. That was a while ago, they MAY have spawned since then, so the number might be higher.

Quick google seems to confirm the information that Rich has offered.   There might another member that has more info but if not maybe try calling the Kushog Lake Marine Phone #: 705-489-2628, or a local tackle shop.   Have a great trip!
There is about 11 musky give or take.
I just kept a 56" for dinner so make that 10
Thanks for the serious and humorous responses:) I will cast some muskie baits but it looks like a smallmouth mission. How is the fishing in Kushog in general?
